Literature.Title: Rhodopeptins (Mer-N1033), novel cyclic tetrapeptides with antifungal activity from Rhodococcus sp. I. Taxonomy, fermentation, isolation, physico-chemical properties and biological activities.
Literature.Author: Chiba H, Agematu H, Kaneto R, Terasawa T, Sakai K, Dobashi K, Yoshioka T

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Candida albicans IFM 40009(MIC=1.25µg/ml),Candida albicans ATCC 10231(MIC=2.5µg/ml),Candida kefyr IAM 4829(MIC=0.31µg/ml),Cryptococcus neoformans TIMM 0354(MIC=0.63µg/ml),Aspergillus terreus F822(MIC=5µg/ml),Aspergillus fumigatus TIMM 0063(MIC=>80µg/ml),Aspergillus fumigatus IFM 41088(MIC=>80µg/ml),Escherichia coli C600(MIC=>64µg/ml),Escherichia coli NIHJ(MIC=>64µg/ml),Klebsiella pneumoniae PCI 602(MIC=>64µg/ml),Klebsiella aerogenes ATCC 13048(MIC=>64µg/ml),Enterobacter cloacae ATCC 13047(MIC=>64µg/ml),Salmonella typhimurium T-287(MIC=>64µg/ml),Serratia marcescens IAM 1021(MIC=>64µg/ml),Proteus mirabilis IFM OM-9(MIC=>64µg/ml),Pseudomonas aeruginosa IAM 1095(MIC=>64µg/ml),Pseudomonas aeruginosa IFO 3755(MIC=>64µg/ml),Morganella morganii KM-112(MIC=>64µg/ml),Bacillus subtilis ATCC 6633(MIC=>64µg/ml),Micrococcus luteus ATCC 9341(MIC=>64µg/ml),Staphylococcus aureus 209P(MIC=64µg/ml),Staphylococcus aureus Smith(MIC=16µg/ml)
